name: Space Ava
description:
Space Ava is a turn-based puzzle game featuring a colorful cast of characters lost in an inhabitable black hole, styled after the graphical and audio limitations of the Sega Master System.

The game features a password-based system that should automatically remember the password of the last level you played; if not and if you forgot your password, you can also go to a level select in the "Options" menu.

Controls (menus, dialogue):
Arrow keys or WASD: Move cursor
Spacebar or Z: Continue, or select option
Enter: Skip dialogue, or select option

Controls (in-game):
Arrow keys or WASD: Move Ava
Enter: Pause game (view password)
That's it!
